title: Walk with Us | Guests: Sheriff Chris Swanson & Elijah Schaffer | 6/1/20
description:
The similarities between America now and in 1968 are shocking. But what saved us last time? American space travel is back after a successful SpaceX/NASA mission! Why haven’t the media and Democrat officials gone as hard after the rioters as they did against stay-at-home protesters? We were all in agreement about George Floyd’s death, so who’s fanning the flames of division? President Trump has promised to declare Antifa a terrorist organization, which will open many doors leftists want to stay shut. Sheriff Chris Swanson of Flint, Michigan, joins to discuss why he laid down his baton and walked with protesters in a viral moment of hope. BlazeTV’s Elijah Schaffer gives an exclusive look at how violent the riots in Dallas got.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
